title: Salt and vinegar sautéed potatoes

default: 1 baking potato, peeled and chopped into small cubes
salt and freshly ground black pepper
¼ beef tomato, seeds removed, chopped

steps: Heat the oil in a frying pan and gently fry the chopped potato for 4-5 minutes. Add the garlic, season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper and continue to fry for a further 4-5 minutes.
Add the vinegar and tomato and stir well. Cook gently until the tomato starts to break down and the potatoes are tender, 10-15 minutes.
Stir in the chopped fresh herbs and serve immediately as a side dish.
